commit.message:
[WFCORE-482] Improve the comment on why the privileged action is required. Also reduce the file permissions to the log4j2-jboss-logmanager instead of ALL FILES.

https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFCORE-482

nodes.bodyText: Does this testsuite support using -Djboss.dist to run against a different distribution? If so I don't think this will work as that dist would probably be a fat server.
